statements: SELECT * FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT store_name, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_usage > 100;
SELECT store_name, address FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY store_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE store_id = 2;
SELECT store_name, address FROM energy_consumption WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY store_name DESC;
SELECT store_id, store_name, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_usage > 1000;
SELECT store_id, store_name, address FROM energy_consumption WHERE store_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT store_id, store_name, energy_usage FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_usage BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY energy_usage DESC;
SELECT store_id, store_name, address FROM energy_consumption WHERE address IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM StoreEnergyConsumption WHERE year = 2021
SELECT store_name, daily_energy_consumption FROM StoreEnergyConsumption WHERE store_id = 1
SELECT DISTINCT month FROM StoreEnergyConsumption
SELECT store_name, improvement_description FROM StoreEnergyConsumption JOIN EfficiencyImprovements ON StoreEnergyConsumption.store_id = EfficiencyImprovements.store_id

SELECT store_name, year, improvement_cost FROM StoreEnergyConsumption JOIN EfficiencyImprovements ON StoreEnergyConsumption.store_id = EfficiencyImprovements.store_id AND EfficiencyImprovements.improvement_cost > 10000 ORDER BY Improvement_cost DESC
SELECT * FROM StoreEnergyConsumption WHERE year = 2021 AND month = 6 ORDER BY daily_energy_consumption DESC;
SELECT store_name, SUM(daily_energy_consumption) AS total_energy_consumed FROM StoreEnergyConsumption GROUP BY store_name HAVING total_energy_consumed > 500;
SELECT store_name, year, month, daily_energy_consumption FROM StoreEnergyConsumption WHERE daily_energy_consumption BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY year DESC, month ASC;
SELECT se.store_name, ei.improvement_description FROM StoreEnergyConsumption se INNER JOIN EfficiencyImprovements ei ON se.store_id = ei.store_id WHERE ei.improvement_cost > 10000;

SELECT se.store_name, COUNT(ei.improvement_id) AS num_improvements FROM StoreEnergyConsumption se LEFT JOIN EfficiencyImprovements ei ON se.store_id = ei.store_id GROUP BY se.store_name ORDER BY num_improvements DESC;
SELECT store_id, consumption_date, kWh_consumed, efficiency_rating FROM store_energy_consumption
SELECT * FROM store_energy_consumption
SELECT store_id, kWh_consumed FROM store_energy_consumption WHERE efficiency_rating > 0.8
SELECT consumption_date, kWh_consumed, efficiency_rating FROM store_energy_consumption ORDER BY consumption_date DESC
SELECT AVG(kWh_consumed) AS avg_consumption FROM store_energy_consumption
SELECT store_id, kWh_consumed FROM store_energy_consumption WHERE efficiency_rating > 0.8 ORDER BY kWh_consumed DESC;
SELECT store_id, consumption_date, kWh_consumed, efficiency_rating FROM store_energy_consumption WHERE store_id IN (2, 4, 6) ORDER BY consumption_date ASC;
SELECT store_id, kWh_consumed, efficiency_rating FROM store_energy_consumption WHERE kWh_consumed > 500 AND efficiency_rating < 0.9;
SELECT * FROM store_energy_consumption WHERE consumption_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY store_id ASC, consumption_date DESC;
SELECT store_id, AVG(kWh_consumed) AS avg_kWh_consumed FROM store_energy_consumption GROUP BY store_id HAVING AVG(kWh_consumed) > 300;
SELECT store_id, month, year FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT store_id, location, store_name FROM stores ORDER BY store_id DESC;
SELECT store_id, opportunity_description FROM efficiency_opportunities WHERE store_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE year = 2022 AND month = 6;
SELECT event_time, event_description, user_id FROM audit_log ORDER BY event_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE year = 2021
SELECT store_name, location FROM stores ORDER BY store_id DESC
SELECT opportunity_description FROM efficiency_opportunities WHERE store_id = 1
SELECT store_id, month, SUM(energy_usage) AS total_energy_usage FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY store_id, month
SELECT event_time, event_description FROM audit_log ORDER BY event_time ASC
SELECT * FROM Store;
SELECT store_name, location FROM Store ORDER BY store_id DESC;
SELECT store_name, location FROM Store WHERE store_id = 2;
SELECT store_name, location FROM Store WHERE location LIKE '%Square%';
SELECT store_name, location FROM Store WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY store_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Store;
SELECT store_name, location FROM Store WHERE store_id = 1;
SELECT store_id, SUM(consumption_kwh) AS total_consumption FROM EnergyConsumption GROUP BY store_id;
SELECT e.store_id, s.store_name, COUNT(e.employee_id) AS total_employees FROM StoreEmployees e JOIN Store s ON e.store_id = s.store_id GROUP BY e.store_id, s.store_name;
SELECT * FROM EfficiencyImprovements WHERE improvement_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
